languages.text: "Я не сразу связала все эти события воедино. Культисты на Футфоле. Культисты на Салис Прайм. Культисты, напавшие на корабль, и предательство Кунрада. Что если все это — звенья одной цепи? Что если они давно проникли в ряды слуг фон Валанциус? Что если я... я сама привела этих еретиков на заповедную планету своими поисками?"

traits.locale_text: "Я не сразу связала все эти события воедино. Культисты на Футфоле. Культисты на Салис Прайм. Культисты, напавшие на корабль, и предательство Кунрада. Что если все это — звенья одной цепи? Что если они давно проникли в ряды слуг фон Валанциус? Что если я... я сама привела этих еретиков на заповедную планету своими поисками?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"
languages.original_text: "Я не сразу связала все эти события воедино. Культисты на Футфоле. Культисты на Салис Прайм. Культисты, напавшие на корабль, и предательство Кунрада. Что если все это — звенья одной цепи? Что если они давно проникли в ряды слуг фон Валанциус? Что если я... я сама привела этих еретиков на заповедную планету своими поисками?"

traits.locale_text: "I didn't tie these events together at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I was the one who brought those heretics to a sacred planet with my search?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I didn't tie these events together at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I was the one who brought those heretics to a sacred planet with my search?"

What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我一开始并没有把这些事情联系起来。可现在想想，落脚港的邪教徒，萨利斯主星的邪教徒，袭击了飞船的邪教徒，还有昆拉德的背叛之举。如果这一切都是息息相关的呢？万一那些人早就渗透到了冯·瓦兰修斯的身边了呢？万一是我……是我执意要去探索，才把那群异端分子引到了那颗神圣的行星上呢？”
languages.original_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: “我一开始并没有把这些事情联系起来。可现在想想，落脚港的邪教徒，萨利斯主星的邪教徒，袭击了飞船的邪教徒，还有昆拉德的背叛之举。如果这一切都是息息相关的呢？万一那些人早就渗透到了冯·瓦兰修斯的身边了呢？万一是我……是我执意要去探索，才把那群异端分子引到了那颗神圣的行星上呢？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Al principio no relacionaba los sucesos. Los sectarios de Paso, los de Salis Prime, los que atacaron la nave y la traición de Kunrad. ¿Y si todos estos sucesos están relacionados? ¿Y si se infiltraron entre los siervos de los von Valancius hace mucho? ¿Y si...? ¿Y si guie a esos herejes al planeta sagrado con mi búsqueda?».
languages.original_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: «Al principio no relacionaba los sucesos. Los sectarios de Paso, los de Salis Prime, los que atacaron la nave y la traición de Kunrad. ¿Y si todos estos sucesos están relacionados? ¿Y si se infiltraron entre los siervos de los von Valancius hace mucho? ¿Y si...? ¿Y si guie a esos herejes al planeta sagrado con mi búsqueda?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「最初はこれらの出来事が結びつきませんでした。フットフォールの教団信者たち。サリス・プライムでの教団信者たち。船を襲った教団信者、そしてクンラッドの裏切り。これらがすべて同じ鎖のつながりだとしたら？もし彼らがフォン・ヴァランシウスのしもべたちの中に、ずっと前から入り込んでいたとしたら？もし我が…我が異端者たちを聖なる惑星に導いたのだとしたら？」
languages.original_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: 「最初はこれらの出来事が結びつきませんでした。フットフォールの教団信者たち。サリス・プライムでの教団信者たち。船を襲った教団信者、そしてクンラッドの裏切り。これらがすべて同じ鎖のつながりだとしたら？もし彼らがフォン・ヴァランシウスのしもべたちの中に、ずっと前から入り込んでいたとしたら？もし我が…我が異端者たちを聖なる惑星に導いたのだとしたら？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe diese Ereignisse zunächst nicht verknüpft. Die Kultisten auf Footfall. Die Kultisten auf Salis Prime. Die Kultisten, die das Schiff angriffen, und Kunrads Verrat. Was, wenn das alles Glieder derselben Kette sind? Was, wenn sie die Reihen der Diener derer von Valancius schon lange infiltriert haben? Was, wenn ich ...? wenn ich diese Ketzer durch meine Suche zu dem heiligen Planeten geführt habe?"
languages.original_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe diese Ereignisse zunächst nicht verknüpft. Die Kultisten auf Footfall. Die Kultisten auf Salis Prime. Die Kultisten, die das Schiff angriffen, und Kunrads Verrat. Was, wenn das alles Glieder derselben Kette sind? Was, wenn sie die Reihen der Diener derer von Valancius schon lange infiltriert haben? Was, wenn ich ...? wenn ich diese Ketzer durch meine Suche zu dem heiligen Planeten geführt habe?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas tout de suite fait le lien entre ces événements. Les cultistes de Castel, ceux de Salis Primus, l'attaque du vaisseau ou la trahison de Kunrad... Et s'il s'agissait des maillons d'une même chaîne ? Et si les hérétiques s'étaient depuis longtemps infiltrés parmi les serviteurs des von Valancius ? Et si... je les avais moi-même menés à la planète sacrée dans ma quête ? »
languages.original_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas tout de suite fait le lien entre ces événements. Les cultistes de Castel, ceux de Salis Primus, l'attaque du vaisseau ou la trahison de Kunrad... Et s'il s'agissait des maillons d'une même chaîne ? Et si les hérétiques s'étaient depuis longtemps infiltrés parmi les serviteurs des von Valancius ? Et si... je les avais moi-même menés à la planète sacrée dans ma quête ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "En başta bu olaylar arasındaki bağlantıyı göremedim. Binliman'daki tarikatçılar ile Salis Prime'dakiler... Gemiye düzenlenen saldırı ve Kunrad'ın ihaneti... Bunlar, daha büyük bir zincirin halkaları olabilir mi? Ya çoktan von Valancius saflarına sızdılarsa? Peki ya... O kâfirleri, kutsal gezegene götüren kişi bensem?"
languages.original_text: "I didn't connect these events at first. The cultists on Footfall. The cultists on Salis Prime. The cultists attacking the ship and Kunrad's betrayal. What if these are all links in the same chain? What if they've long since infiltrated the ranks of the von Valancius servants? What if I... I led those heretics to the sacred planet with my search?"

traits.locale_text: "En başta bu olaylar arasındaki bağlantıyı göremedim. Binliman'daki tarikatçılar ve Salis Prime'dakiler… Gemiye düzenlenen saldırı ve Kunrad'ın ihaneti… Bunlar, daha büyük bir zincirin halkaları olabilir mi? Ya çoktan von Valancius saflarına sızdılarsa? Peki ya… O kâfirleri, kutsal gezegene götüren kişi bensem?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
